alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Inland; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:34PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mobile and northwestern Baldwin Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 533 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles north of Stockton, or 13 miles northwest of Bay Minette, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Creola, Stockton, Axis, Mount Vernon and Movico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
